column5: If you are serious about business this degree gives you the knowledge to trade in a global context and understand how global organisations work and thrive. It gives you all you need to know across management functions and prepares you for international global management. Not only can you extend your skills and knowledge if you come from a business degree background, but if you have trained in an entirely different degree, the International Business Management programme widens your potential to work at top level in your profession, develop enterprise, and consult internationally.
column9: 12 Months Full time or 24 Months Part Time
